name: Call Pizza Center
description:
Call Pizza Center . with NEW pizzeria answering service sound and NEW Best Pizza.
Prank your friend. Girlfriend or boyfriend. boss. etc...
Phone with the original ringtone of the phone.

Call Pizza Center Features:

- simulate fake incoming call from pizza place.
- sound of answering service of pizzeria .
- options to Decline or accept call.
- easy to use.
- For all Ages.
